definition: variant of 砝碼|砝码[fa3 ma3]
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: Divers weights, [and] divers measures, both of them [are] alike abomination to the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 兩樣的法碼，兩樣的升斗，都爲耶和華所憎惡。

sentences.english: Along with Bynum, Farmar has played an immense part in what felt like the unthinkable mere months ago.
sentences.chinese: 和拜納姆一樣，法碼爾跟打得比幾個月前進步了許多。
